product_name: Womo Designs Accessory Kit - Garmin Edge Series Bike Computer And GoPro HD Camera
long_description: Compatable with the Womo Designs Handlebar Chassis, this Accessory Kit allows the attachment of your Garmin Edge 500 or 800 series bike computer and your GoPro HD camera (sold separately).
short_description: Compatable with the Womo Designs Handlebar Chassis, this Accessory Kit allows the attachment of your Garmin Edge 500 or 800 series bike computer and your GoPro HD camera (sold separately).
